msg: Raised WAIT_LIMIT to 60 seconds to reduce overhead (inadvertently left out of earlier commit).

author: noel
msg: Reverted change from wait(long) to wait().  There appears to be an infrequent race condition that leaves all threads sleeping.  Raised WAIT_LIMIT to 60 seconds to reduce overhead.
